column5: Has anyone ever been there, and, if so, what did you think about the place? I've never been to Canada fishing, and I am trying to find some place to go, but not really sure where to go. Any information would be helpful.Thanks for the info. I have no idea where to go for our first trip. My husband used to go to Lake of the Woods as a child, but his brother says that the area is all fished out. I would like to go where the meals are cooked, but we can do shore lunches. Would also like a place that has electrical and indoor plumbing. Again, thanks for all of your help. I was completely overwhelmed when searching for a place, as there are soooo many.
Where about in Canada are you looking at? Lac Seul is an awesome place to fish! Try: Fisherman's Cove Onaway Lodge Lac Seul Lodge Evergreen Resort You won't be disappointed! Good Luck!
s. Matthews,If you give us an idea of where you want to go and what accommodations you want people on here could give you a better idea of where to go.Scott
I have edited my post to give you an idea of what we are looking for. Thanks.

I agree that Lac Seul is an awesome fishery. My wife and I have fished it for the past 12 years and have never been disappointed. The resorts listed above are all good, but the one we stay at is Whitewing Resort by Ear Falls - the grounds are well kept, the cabins are modern and well maintained and they do have the option of an american plan.Good luck wherever you go!
